participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Passionate and hardworking, with a love for nature and creativity.
participant_1.background: I want to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch. I met the love of my life while working at the hospital. I'm a farmer who likes to pickle eggs and horseback ride in my spare time. I hate evil. My hobby is photography.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and family-oriented, enjoys writing and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: I was disappointed after my girlfriend cancelled our plans. I used social media to stay connected with my friends and family during the holidays, but I didn't let it take over my life. I work at the grocery store. I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing. My favorite people are my family and the customers I clean for.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for a living?
I work at a grocery store. It's not my dream job, but it pays the bills.
I hear ya. I'm a farmer, and it's not always easy, but I love it.
What's your favorite part of it?
I love being outside, and I love working with my animals.
I can relate to that. I love being outdoors too. I love to hike and camp.
Me too! I'm actually going on a camping trip with my family this weekend.
That sounds fun! I'm jealous. I have to work this weekend.
Oh, that's too bad. Maybe you can go on a hike with your friends or something.
Yeah, I think I'll do that. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem.
So, what are some of your other hobbies?
I love to take photos. I'm actually trying to start my own photography business.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to take better photos.
You should! It's really fun.
Maybe I will.
You should! It's really fun.
Maybe I will.
Cool! I'd love to see some of your photos if you ever get them developed.
Yeah, I'll be sure to send you some.
Awesome
